vehicles.description: The concrete conveyor belt of a construction vehicle extends upwards and towards the direction of the overpass, occupying the right half of the far-right lane.
vehicles.explanation: The position and size of construction vehicles may obstruct the view and partially block the lanes, requiring self-driving vehicles to change lanes or slow down to maintain a safe following distance. Due to its function, this vehicle travels at a slower speed and may perform unexpected maneuvers.

barriers.description: A temporary fence has been erected on the right side of the road, indicating that construction or road renovation is underway there.
barriers.explanation: This roadblock requires this vehicle to keep to the left to stay away from potential hazards related to the construction area.

other objects.description: On the right side of the road, a row of shared bikes is arranged outside the traffic cones.
other objects.explanation: These bicycles are stationary and should not directly affect the movement of autonomous vehicles, but their presence indicates a potential area of pedestrian or cyclist activity.

general_perception.description and explanation:
The image depicts several road users. 

Firstly, there is a construction vehicle with a concrete conveyor belt extending upwards and towards the direction of an overpass, occupying the right half of the far-right lane. This vehicle's position and size could obstruct the view and partially block the lanes, necessitating lane-changing or slowing down for safe distance maintenance by autonomous vehicles. Additionally, the construction vehicle travels at a slower speed and may perform unexpected maneuvers.

Furthermore, a temporary fence has been erected on the right side of the road, signaling ongoing construction or road renovation. This barrier requires vehicles to keep to the left to avoid potential hazards associated with the construction area.

Lastly, on the right side of the road, a row of shared bikes is arranged outside of some traffic cones. Although these bicycles are stationary and will not directly affect autonomous vehicle movement, their presence highlights a potential area for pedestrian or cyclist activity.

driving_suggestion: Drivers should reduce speed and prepare to change lanes to the left to safely pass construction vehicles. Maintain a safe following distance, closely monitor the movements of electric scooters and construction vehicles, and be ready to change lanes as needed. Adhere to lane markings set by traffic cones, and do not attempt to enter bicycle lanes or areas restricted by cones. Stay alert for other road users who may suddenly enter the road, especially near parked bicycles, and adjust your speed and position accordingly to ensure safety. It is recommended to keep to the left to avoid issues related to temporary fencing on the right.

1.description and explanation: This is a construction vehicle, specifically a concrete mixer truck, identified by its large rotating drum used to mix concrete ingredients. The vehicle is heavy and may operate or maneuver unpredictably, requiring ample space and caution when overtaking or passing. The ego vehicle should maintain a safe distance and be prepared for potential stops or slow movement from the construction vehicle.
